Articles.Content:
Hi guys, this is my Ferrari Skyracer (fictional name), it is built with semplicity in mind so it has clean lines, but still looking supercool and very fast.

The push propellor design allow me to easily replace propellor engines with stock engines without too much modification.

She flies pretty good, but due the extra weight at wings end (engines and tanks) it's a bit hard to control on roll axis, but it's not a real problem because this plane is just meant for speed.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Mod used KAX

DOWNLOAD

****This plane will be updated when new patch comes out with new stock engines****

Edited September 4, 2015 by eorin
I wish this was a real thing
Update: modified the plane a bit, and solved a structural wing problem
Looks great, I'd love if Ferrari made planes, like Fiat and Messerschmitt did during the WW2. Awesome!

Looks great, I'd love if Ferrari made planes, like Fiat and Messerschmitt did during the WW2. Awesome!

Thanks brix! What a long time! Yeah fiat centauro and Macchi folgore/veltro was such a good planes (not so well armed the folgore), and the reggiane saggitario? what a plane!!! And what about the Mc 72? i think the best looking propeller ever made.

Edited September 5, 2015 by eorin
